I like to play him in the mid lane. He's able to bully many laners there, and he can push really hard. The shorter lane also means more farm for stacking his W passive. He can also effectively roam early on using his ult, or all in his opponent very well.

Dude I think he's pretty fun! And mid-late game just from farming and kills/assists you can get like 500 extra health on his W passive. He's super tanky, I do suck with his ultimate though, but yeah I really like him. Just start flask, spam q and e, not w, and have fun in lane :D
He is the hardest to play and learn, but most rewarding Top Lane ever. He is also a really good Jungle.
